name: Alone in Mars (Zadium)
description:
Alone in Mars is a platform videogame, your main objective will be to rescue your avatar from Mars, to achive that, you have a special suit that can equip a single ability: Double Jump, a Hook or a Dash. Use this powers to complete the challenges and to bring back home your astronaut.

Language: Spanish.

Duration 15 - 25 min aprox.
